name: Gateway Project: Bora Bora
alt: Gateway Bora Bora Project Home page
description: The first project ever created by yours-truly in September 2020. It consist of HTML and CSS. A bit of context, this project focused on a location we, the cohort, wanted to visit. In the website, we included a home page, activities and accommodations page, and a contact us page. This was definitely one of the hardest projects as I did not previously have much experience with websites so I am proud of the functionality and it looks pretty nice for my first website. Web page is CSS and HTML validated by W3C Markup Validation Services.

name: Reservation App: El Amingo Pub & Grill
description: A reservation app created with HTML and CSS. The purpose was to create a simple form that looks clean and user-friendly while practicing more CSS. Created in early October 2020.
